SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &CHECK# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_APP_ID# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_APP_NAME# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &CHECK# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either provide [Application ID] or provide [Application Name]." : ENDIF
: SET &CHECK# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_IDS# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_NAMES# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &CHECK# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either provide [Environment IDs] or provide [Environment Names]." : ENDIF
: SET &CHECK# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_DEP_PLAN# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_BUILD# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_PROJECT# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_DEP_PLAN_ID# <> "" : IF &CHECK# > 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either provide [Deployment Plan ID] or all of [Deployment Plan Name, Build Name, Project Name]." : ENDIF : ELSE : IF &CHECK# < 3 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either provide [Deployment Plan ID] or all of [Deployment Plan Name, Build Name, Project Name]." : ENDIF : ENDIF
!--------------------------------------------Prepare JSON---------------------------------------------------- : SET &JSON# = "{"
! Application Id : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_APP_ID# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, '"applicationId":"&UC4RB_CA_RA_APP_ID#"') : ELSE ! Application Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_APP_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, '"application":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"') : ENDIF
! Environment IDs : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_IDS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_IDS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 2000 : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[],SIZE) : SET &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&STRINGS#[&VAR#]) : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"environmentIds":[') : IF &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, '"&UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING#"') : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") : SET &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&STRINGS#[&VAR#]) : IF &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"&UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING#"') : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ']') : ENDIF
! Environment Names : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_NAMES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_ENV_NAMES# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 2000 : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[],SIZE) : SET &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&STRINGS#[&VAR#]) : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"environments":[') : IF &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, '"&UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING#"') : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") : SET &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&STRINGS#[&VAR#]) : IF &UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"&UC4RB_TRIMMED_STRING#"') : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ']') : ENDIF
! Artifact Package Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_DEPLOYMENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"deployment":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"')
! Description : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_DESCRIPTION# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_DESCRIPTION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"deploymentDescription":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"') : ENDIF
! Stage to Perform : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_STAGE_TO_PERFORM# = "All" : SET &UC4RB_CA_RA_STAGE_TO_PERFORM# = "" : ENDIF : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"stageToPerform":"&UC4RB_CA_RA_STAGE_TO_PERFORM#"')
! Deployment Plan ID : IF &UC4RB_CA_RA_DEP_PLAN_ID# <> "" : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"deploymentPlanId":"&UC4RB_CA_RA_DEP_PLAN_ID#"') : ELSE ! Deployment Plan Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_DEP_PLAN# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"deploymentPlan":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"')
! Build Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_BUILD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"build":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"')
! Project Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_RA_PROJECT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, ',"project":"&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"') : ENDIF
: SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#, '}')

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_RA.PUB.ACTION.RUN_DEPLOYMENTS
= General description = This action creates a deployment from an existing deployment plan (V3+)
= Failure Conditions = * If both or none amongst the given combinations are provided: [Application ID] or [Application Name]. * If both or none amongst the given combinations are provided: [Environment IDs] or [Environment Names]. * If both or none amongst the given combinations are provided: [Deployment Plan ID] or [Deployment Plan Name, Build Name, Project Name].
= Inputs = * Application ID : Provide an application Id for this deployment run. Eg 4 * Application Name : Provide an application name for this deployment run. E.g. Sample Application * Deployment name : Provide deployment name for this deployment run. E.g. Sample Deployment * Description : Provide description for deployment run. E.g. This is a sample description * Environment IDs : Provide IDs of the environments where deployment is going to run. Eg: 2, 3 * Environment Names : Provide Names of the environments where deployment is going to run. Eg: env2, env3 * Stage to Perform : Specify stage to be performed. E.g. All, Deployment, Initialization, Validation, Approve-Gate, Distribute-Execution-Server, Distribute-Agent, Post-Deployment * Deployment Plan ID : Provide deployment plan ID. E.g. 6 * Deployment Plan Na : Provide name of the deployment plan. E.g. Test Deployment Plan * Build Name : Provide name to the build. E.g. 1.0 * Project Name : Provide name for the project to be created. E.g.Test Project
Note: * Either provide [Application ID] or [Application Name]. * Either provide [Environment IDs] or [Environment Names]. * Either provide [Deployment Plan ID] or all of [Deployment Plan Name, Build Name, Project Name].
= Behavior = Only supported for CA RA version id V3 or higher.
=Return Value= UC4RB_CA_RA_DEPLOYMENT_IDS :Comma separated IDs of the ran deployments.
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is non-zero in case of failure.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = AE logs will be displayed in the AE report.
